name: Fast Food (C64)
description:
I had said Taz would be my last 2600 port for a while, but then someone asked for this and it seemed simple enough to do in an evening, after a particularly good day on Galaga I thought I'd treat myself......?

How To Play

Simply move the mouth around the screen eating as much food as possible, while AVOIDING THE PURPLE PICKLES. If you eat six of these, it's game over. 

Some foods are worth more calories than others, and unlike the original I have added double scoring for items travelling at higher speeds to encourage some risk taking. After every 30 or so items eaten you will get fatter and the speed of the game will increase. 

Compatible with PAL and NTSC machines.

Calorie Counts (double for faster foods)
